text:
Unfinished project. All the original parts I have are included.

Bike is pretty close to completion. The plan was to convert it to a single speed fixie but it never materialized. Things you still need to do is buy is brake cables and housing, new tyres, grips and one or two spokes, maybe some decals if you wish or a fresh paint, I just don't have the time.. hoping it can find a good home and finally be completed. 

I've completely stripped down every part of the bike. Serviced both hubs, headset, stem, bearings, cups, the works. Basically all of the moving parts are serviced. Fenders have been cleaned up and support bars repainted. Frame cleaned up and Grey Undercoat applied. Bought a new front basket for it, new shifters, new bell, new seat.
